int32_t ssp_MasterReadWrite ( LPC_SSP_TypeDef *  SSPx,
void *  rbuffer,
void *  wbuffer,
uint32_t  length 
)

SSP Read write in polling mode function (Master mode).

Parameters:
[in] SSPdev,: Pointer to SSP device
[out] rbuffer,: pointer to read buffer
[in] wbuffer,: pointer to write buffer
[in] length,: length of data to read and write
Returns:
0 if there no data to send, otherwise return 1
